info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 10 at 5:21PM EDT by NWS Peachtree City GA
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...
Big Haynes Creek at Lenora Road near Snellville affecting Gwinnett County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring.
* WHERE...Big Haynes Creek at Lenora Road near Snellville.
* WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 10 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding will occur in the woodlands and pastures near the creek upstream and downstream from the gage on Lenora Road. Some outbuildings near the creek upstream and on the left bank from the bridge may begin to flood.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 PM EDT Tuesday the stage was 10.4 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 10 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
